popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: Hey there! Welcome to the intro tour. This is the Onboarding Pilot which will guide you through the application.

popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: This should not get to tiering, so we will keep it short with just a rough overview of some main functions.

popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: If a blinking arrow shows up, it is needed to excecute a click or touch from your side.

popover.title: Welcome
popover.description: Lets dont waste any time and start with the first section…

popover.title: your personal inbox
popover.description: the dashboard functions as your personal inbox. Here you can see all kind of invites or notifications or your faviorites.

popover.title: your inbox
popover.description: for now it is quite empty here but if any other users want to /chat with you. or wants to work collaborativly on a /write document, you can find your notification here.

popover.title: your inbox
popover.description: if there are things to catch up for you, a small dot will appear next to the /dashboard link in the main navigation.

popover.title: your inbox
popover.description: maybe you got already invited to some spaces. if thats the case you can accept those. with the click on the underlined name you will be redirected to the space.

popover.title: your inbox
popover.description: but lets lets see first whats going on in this application. lets go to the /explore page next…

popover.title: …your spaces
popover.description: First of all we will start with the explore page. This is where you can find all the spaces structured by their context.

popover.title: …your spaces
popover.description: You can navigate from level to level and see what is going on in the different contexts.

popover.title: …your spaces
popover.description: Lets click on the entry level and tickle down the tree.

popover.title: communicate.
popover.description: on of the mayor functionallities is the chat. here you can communicate with others in real time. as one to one or in groups.

popover.title: communicate.
popover.description: all your chats will be listed here. it will be seperated in private chats and groups.

popover.title: communicate.
popover.description: if you want to create a new chat just clikc on the button on the top.

popover.title: communicate.
popover.description: you can select between a direct message or to create a group chat.

popover.title: communicate.
popover.description: especially with groups chats you can change the visibility of the chat. if you want to make it public to all members or just to the invited ones.

popover.title: communicate – encrypted
popover.description: be aware of the the end to end encryption. if you choose the option all participants would need to have their encryption key stored.

popover.title: communicate – encrypted
popover.description: so you can use the e2ee functionallity but only if you know what you are doing.

popover.title: communicate – contextualize
popover.description: anyway, after creating a groupchat, you can later assign it in /expore to a specific context. just like an file or a document.

popover.title: going on
popover.description: speaking of documents, lets go to the /write tool next…

popover.title: lets create some items.
popover.description: with the /write tool you can create some collaborative text documents.

popover.title: create!
popover.description: lets create one just as an example as for now it looks quite empty here. Just press on the add button.

popover.title: name it
popover.description: first of all give the document a name. it will be visible to others.

popover.title: protect it
popover.description: if you want to protect it from being seen by others, which knows the document address, you can set a password.

popover.title: create it
popover.description: press the button and tada you have created a document. you can now edit it and invite others to join.

popover.title: library
popover.description: from now on you can find all yoru documents which you created in /write. Quite handy, isn't it?

popover.title: contextualize
popover.description: dont forget you can also add your documents to the /explore to make them visible to others in the specfic contexts.

popover.title: show yourself
popover.description: Next stop: Your Account. This is where you can personalize your profile how it will be seen by others.

popover.title: whats your name?
popover.description: you can change your display name to anything you want to. but be aware, that your official name will still be visible to others.

popover.title: profile picture
popover.description: how about adding a photo? it will be visible to others for example in the chat.
we are heding towards the end of this onboarding. lets go back to explore once more.

popover.title: browse and add
popover.description: browse around the strucutre, request acces or add things on your own in the contexts you are interested in.

popover.title: missing something?
popover.description: if thtere isnt that much of a content yet, tell others of your institution to join and contribute.

popover.title: more?
popover.description: there are many other functions to use. Just have a look around and try them out.

popover.title: finished
popover.description: thats all for now. You can restart the onboarding at any time on /account. Have fun!
